author: Wzyss
install_msg: Thank you for installing Giveaway. Use `[p]help giveaway` to see available commands.
name: Giveaway
short: Reaction-based giveaways with optional claim system.
description: Run giveaways with reaction-based entry, interactive or command-based setup, and management (reroll, end, edit, cancel). Optional configurable claim window with automatic reroll if not claimed.
